This is the pilot for our first interactive game show,Â XO.

The show lasts for around 10 mins. We match a bachelor and bachelorette based on a dating algorithm, and they have to choose between love or money at the end of the show! If they both choose love, they win a date of the dreams worth $1000. If they both choose money, they win nothing. If one chooses money and the other chooses love, the person who chooses money goes home with $500. Hope you enjoy!
